content.text:
# 2017 Movieguide Awards

The 2017 Movieguide Awards ceremony honored the best films and television of 2016.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first, highlighted in boldface, and indicated with a double dagger ().
{| class=wikitable
|-
| valign="top" width="50%" style="background: yellow;" | Epiphany Prize for Most Inspiring Movie - Honoring movies that are wholesome, spiritually uplifting and inspirational
| valign="top" width="50%" style="background: yellow;" | Epiphany Prize for Most Inspiring TV Program
|- valign="top"
|
*The Young Messiah
**Ben-Hur
**''God's Not Dead 2
**Hacksaw Ridge
**Hail, Caesar!
**Miracles from Heaven
**Risen
**Silence
|
*'''Dolly Parton's Christmas of Many Colors: Circle of Love'
**Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.: Episodes 3.20-22: "Emancipation", "Absolution", and "Ascension"
**''Karen Kingsbury's The Bridge Part 2
**Operation Christmas
**The Passion: New Orleans
**Pocahontas: Dove of Peace
**Karen Kingsbury's A Time to Dance
|-
| valign="top" style="background: yellow;" | Faith and Freedom Award for Movies - Honoring movies that promote positive American values
| valign="top" style="background: yellow;" | Faith and Freedom Award for TV
|- valign="top"
